comments.en:
This printer is not yet supported by Gimp-Print, but support for it is under development, but it will most probably take a longer time until this device is really supported.

This printer has is an 8-color (CMYK + red + blue + "gloss enhancer", with two different black inks installed) printer with 1.5 pl drop size. There is nominal support in the Gimp-Print driver 5.0.x that may or may not work in CMYK mode, but the Gimp-Print developers are not very confident in it. It should be an extremely fast printer with a huge gamut (particularly since it uses UltraChrome inks, which are pigment but which have a very large gamut even in CMYK form).
